Detailed Description

This class is a static or client-side entity in a saved chunk.

void ChunkEntity::bind (  ) 

This method is called when we are bound (or maybe unbound), anyway it is called early from the main thread.

Loads a chunk entity description from this section.

void ChunkEntity::toss ( Chunk *  pChunk  )  [virtual]

Puts a chunk entity description into the given chunk.

We should consider having the entity entered only when our chunk is focussed. It may be less important once chunks unload themselves, but I think it should probably be done anyway.

Reimplemented from ChunkItem.
